title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Go to the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of the selected item.
SR:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Go to the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
